doc.title: 10 Minutes
doc.plot: An ordinary day at the office of a distinguished director of an advertising firm. Preparations for the next shoot are going well. The tickets for the theatrical production that he will watch together with his wife later that night have been booked. But what's the point of all that, when you learn that you have only ten minutes to live?
